oai_dc:dc.dc:description: August 26, 1978 Wisconsin Cage Bird Club 1st Annual ShowQA Inn, Hwy. 41 Appleton, WI.Contact:Show Sec., Dennis Gelhar, 1045 Alva St.Menasha, WI 54952November 16,17,18,19, 1978 American Cockatiel Society wil I present theirFirst National Cockatiel Speciality Show Atlanta, GeorgiaShipped in birds accepted" For information:Jo Hal I, Route 1, Box 33 Thorndale, Texas 76577November 24, 1978 National Cage Bird Show at theAtlanta Airport Hilton Georgia Poultry Laboratories has issued the following information for those wishing to ship birds into the state of Georgia for entrance in the show.**You will no longer be required to obtain an approved permit for pet and/or caged birds prior to their ship-ment into Georgia. 'In lieu of the permit, you will be required to furnish to the Georgia Poultry Laboratory, P.O. Box 148, Oakwood, Georgia, 30566, either an invoice, bill of lading, or letter on each shipment which gives the following information:1. Name and address of shipper.2. Name and address of consignee.3. Approximate date of shipment.4. Method of shipment.5. Number and types of birds in each shipment. The New Hampshire Cage Bird Associationwill hold itsFourth Annual Showat the Holiday Innin Nashua, N.H.Anyone needing more information may contact:A.
